com.knowgate.typeutils

Class ClassSpaceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.knowgate.typeutils.ClassSpaceHelper

  • public class ClassSpaceHelper
extends Object
    This class is used to produce combinations of superclasses and interfaces for trying alternative constructors at ObjectFactory
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

    • Method Detail

      • cartesianProduct

        public static List<Class<?>[]> cartesianProduct(Class<?>[] classes1,
                                                Class<?>[] classes2)

        Cartesian product of two Class arrays.

        For example, for {A,B,C} {X,Y,Z} it'd be: List(9) = ({A,X},{A,Y},{A,Z},{B,X},{B,Y},{B,Z},{C,X},{C,Y},{C,Z})
        Parameters:
        classes1 - Class<?>[]
        classes2 - Class<?>[]
        Returns:
        List<Class<?>[2]> Each element in the list will be an array of two classes

      • addDimension

        public static List<Class<?>[]> addDimension(List<Class<?>[]> baseVectors,
                                            Class<?>[] newDimension)

        Add an additional dimension to a list of vectors.

        For example, for List({A,B},{C,D}) , {X,Y} it will be: List(4) = ({A,B,X},{A,B,Y},{C,D,X},{C,D,Y})
        Parameters:
        baseVectors - List<Class<?>[]>
        newDimension - Class<?>[]
        Returns:
        List<Class<?>[2]>

      • product

        .
        Parameters:

      • getClassesAtPackage

        public static Class<?>[] getClassesAtPackage(String packageName)
                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                             IOException

        Scans all classes accessible from the context class loader which belong to the given package and subpackages.

        Parameters:
        packageName - The base package
        Returns:
        The classes
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        IOException
